ingredients.ingredient: 1 (7 pound) pork shoulder roast, trimmed and cut into chunks
3 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles root beer

cookingTips: Slow cook pork in root beer for 8-10 hours on low until extremely tender and easily shredded
Shred meat directly in cooking liquid, then drain and mix with barbecue sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on low-and-slow cooking methods that result in fall-apart-tender pulled pork.
